body: Just tried #paddleboarding for the first time! I’m surprised I didn’t fall in. What do you think of my balance skills? #watersports #adventure

comments.body: You’re a natural! It’s harder than it looks, right? How long did it take you to get the hang of it?
@56565 Thanks! It took me about 20 minutes to stop wobbling and actually feel stable. I thought I was going in a few times!
That’s impressive! Were you on a lake or in the ocean? I hear waves make it a lot tougher.
@67676 I was on a calm lake this time! I’m not ready for ocean waves just yet, haha!
You didn’t fall in?! You’ve got better balance than me! Did you have to practice for long?
@78787 I managed to stay dry this time! I’m sure it’ll take a few more trips to feel really comfortable, though.
Looks like so much fun! Do you think it’s a good workout? I’ve heard it’s great for core strength.
@89898 Definitely! My legs and core were feeling it by the end. Great way to stay active while enjoying the water.
Next challenge: yoga on the paddleboard!
@34343 Haha, that’s a whole new level of balance! Maybe once I can stay upright for more than 30 minutes, I’ll give it a try!
